headline: UBS has more confidence in Deere in 2026 after Q4 report
summary: UBS analyst Steven Fisher reiterates a Buy rating and $535 price target on Deere (DE) shares following Q4 results and an outlook that were “directionally consistent with our expectations and establish 2026 as the ag bottom.” Although the initial FY26 earnings guidance midpoint is slightly lower than the firm had modeled, UBS thinks the miss mainly reflects a weak Q1 in North America and it has more confidence in 2026 as the earnings bottom and in the 2027 recovery following the report, the analy

content.title: UBS has more confidence in Deere in 2026 after Q4 report
content.summary: UBS analyst Steven Fisher reiterates a Buy rating and $535 price target on Deere (DE) shares following Q4 results and an outlook that were “directionally consistent with our expectations and establish 2026 as the ag bottom.” Although the initial FY26 earnings guidance midpoint is slightly lower than the firm had modeled, UBS thinks the miss mainly reflects a weak Q1 in North America and it has more confidence in 2026 as the earnings bottom and in the 2027 recovery following the report, the analy

headline: Deere’s (DE) Softer 2026 Outlook Could Be a Game Changer for Its Investment Narrative
summary: Deere & Company recently reported fourth-quarter and full-year earnings, highlighting fourth-quarter revenue of US$12.39 billion and net income of US$1.07 billion, while also issuing fiscal 2026 guidance of net income between US$4.00 billion and US$4.75 billion. While Deere exceeded expectations in its quarterly results, management cautioned that persistent weakness in the large agriculture sector and ongoing margin pressures could impact performance for the coming year. We'll examine how...
